display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Scourging Blast F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to recover 7.5% endurance to nearby allies and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This effect will trigger roughly 3 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Corruptors and may be slotted into any Corruptor damage power.
